title: Rapid Tests May Be Less Accurate for Omicron, FDA Warns
content:
1. Rapid Tests May Be Less Accurate for Omicron, FDA Warns  Gizmodo
  2. FDA: COVID-19 at-home tests might not detect omicron  11Alive
  3. White House team reacts to FDA report on rapid COVID test sensitivity: PCR, antigen tests 'critical tools'  Fox News
  4. Growing use of at-home tests could lead to an undercount of omicron cases | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Have omicron variant symptoms? Why you can’t get a rapid COVID test  Deseret News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
